translation.en: ♪ You get me closer to God ♪
What...
What's that for?
Uh, wait, wait, wait, Sterling, um...
My virginity is a gift that I want to give to my future wife,
translation.de: Meine Unschuld soll ein Geschenk an meine zukünftige Frau werden.

translation.en: and I'm pretty sure you want to give the same gift to your future husband,
translation.de: Du willst deine sicher für deinen zukünftigen Mann bewahren.

translation.en: so even though I'm feeling very, um...
Horny?
Tempted. Even though I'm feeling very tempted, um...
translation.de: In Versuchung geführt. Aber auch wenn das so ist...

translation.en: I think we should pray... for restraint.
All right.
Dear Lord, please take away Satan's wicked temptation.
translation.de: Lieber Gott, bitte wende Satans Versuchung von uns ab.

translation.en: You are good and gracious, and we strive to be good and gracious
translation.de: Du bist gut und gnädig, und auch wir wollen gut und gnädig sein

translation.en: in the face of the--
the devil.
Okay. Okay.
John 3:16: "God so loved the world
translation.de: Johannes 3,16: "Denn Gott hat die Welt so sehr geliebt,

translation.en: that He gave His one and only son
translation.de: dass er seinen einzigen Sohn hingab,

translation.en: that whoever believes in Him, shall not perish
translation.de: damit jeder, der an ihn glaubt, nicht verloren geht,

translation.en: but have eternal life."
Wait... uh, what?
Whoever believes in Him will have eternal life.
translation.de: Wer an ihn glaubt, wird ewiges Leben haben.

translation.en: You believe in Jesus, don't you? Of course.
Well, then you shall have eternal life.
translation.de: Dann sollst du ewiges Leben haben.

translation.en: "The Lord is my shepherd.
I shall not be in want."
"I shall not be in want."
Oh, man. I really love you. [chuckles]
translation.de: Oh Mann. Ich liebe dich wirklich.

translation.en: First Peter 4:8...
"And above all, love each other... deeply
translation.de: "Vor allem haltet beharrlich fest an der Liebe zueinander;

translation.en: because love covers...
-[groans ecstatically] -...a multitude... of... sin..."
What did you think?
-I thought it was really dope. -Mm-hm.
Yeah, that was-- that was super dope.
What was your favorite part?
I guess, the end?
Yeah, that twisty thing, where I added the second hand?
translation.de: Das Drehen mit der zweiten Hand?

translation.en: That's a new move. Uh...
You experienced my world premiere.
[chuckles] I was just meaning, like, at the end where I...
translation.de: Ich meinte das Ende, wo ich...

translation.en: Oh, r... -Right. Right, right. -Yeah, yeah.
Did it feel better than when you do it with your own hand?
translation.de: War es besser als wenn du es selbst machst?

translation.en: I mean, like... no...
but it's still, like, a lot cooler
because you got tits... -[chuckles] -...and stuff like that, you know?
translation.de: weil du Titten und so was hast.

translation.en: Thank you. That's so helpful.
-[boy] No, you will... -[girl] You want to try and win?
-I don't think you need to cheat-- -[boy] Okay. Let's see.
[girl] Go ahead.
-[boy] Give me that thumb. Give it to me. -[girl] Take it.
Oh. 'Sup, guys.
Nothing much.
-All right. I'm out of here. -Bye, dude.
Have a good night.
Good night, guys.
See ya.
-Bye, Luke. -Later, man.
-[boy] Bye! -[Luke clears his throat]
I know this goes without saying, -but let's keep this private. -[car door shuts]
translation.de: Ist doch klar, dass das hier unter uns bleibt.

translation.en: Sterling, are you sure we feel okay about this?
translation.de: Sterling, bist du sicher, dass es in Ordnung ist?

translation.en: -We sinned against God. -[car engine starts]
But we love each other, and love covers over a multitude of sins.
translation.de: Aber wir lieben uns, und Liebe deckt viele Sünden zu.

translation.en: I really do love you.
And I really, really love you...
-And your penis. -What?
[girl] I think I like Jennings. I know, shocker. The slutty twin actually having feelings for somebody,
translation.de: Ich glaube, ich mag Jennings. Das Flittchen hat Gefühle für jemanden.

translation.en: but hear me out. Three weeks with one guy -is definitely a record for me. -[pop music playing]
translation.de: Aber drei Wochen mit einem Typen sind definitiv ein Rekord.

translation.en: And I've been thinking,
maybe this is the year I-- I-- I do it.
translation.de: ...vielleicht werde ich es dieses Jahr tun.

translation.en: I stop being the "everything but" slut and seal the deal.
translation.de: Schluss mit "alles, nur nicht das", ich mache Nägel mit Köpfen.

translation.en: I've done my research, and it's probably going to hurt the first time,
translation.de: Ich habe recherchiert. Das erst Mal wird wahrscheinlich wehtun.

translation.en: but with patience and a shit ton of coconut oil...
translation.de: Aber mit Geduld und scheiße viel Kokosöl...

translation.en: Nature's lube, you need to know that. ...it's gonna get awesome.
translation.de: ...dem Gleitmittel der Natur... wird es toll.

translation.en: I think I'm finally ready to bone, Sterl.
translation.de: Ich bin endlich bereit zum Vögeln, Sterl.

translation.en: Okay. Jeez, Virgin Mary. You have nothing to say?
translation.de: Okay. Puh, Heilige Jungfrau Maria. Hat's dir die Sprache verschlagen?

translation.en: Actually, technically, you can't call me that anymore,
translation.de: Eigentlich kannst du mich nicht mehr so nennen.

translation.en: seeing as... Luke and I just had sex.
translation.de: Weil... Luke und ich hatten gerade Sex.

translation.en: I'm sorry, what?
Luke and I... just had intercourse.
translation.de: Luke und ich hatten gerade Geschlechtsverkehr.

translation.en: -Intercourse? -Yeah. -You? -Yeah.
-Sex? -Yeah!
Like, "sex" that I talk about all the time?
-Sorry. -In your vagina?
-[giggles] I know. -Yeah. Oh, my God.
-Are you sure? -Yeah.
Okay, I... [giggles] you're-- I guess you're the sluttier twin now.
translation.de: Okay, du bist jetzt wohl das Flittchen.

translation.en: -Oh, my God! Tell me everything-- -Blair!
-[gasping] -Jesus, mother of God!
-God darn it! -[groans]
-[groans] -Dude, that dude looks fine. I say we split!
translation.de: Dem Typen geht's okay. Hauen wir ab!

translation.en: A hit-and-run? Are you insane? Obviously, we call the police and then Mom and Dad--
translation.de: Fahrerflucht? Spinnst du? Wir rufen die Polizei und Mom und Dad an!

translation.en: No! No! No!
Are you forgetting that Dad doesn't know we took his precious hunting truck?
translation.de: Dad weiß nicht, dass wir seinen Truck haben.

translation.en: You know what? I'm going to give that dude a piece of my mind.
translation.de: Ich sage dem Kerl mal meine Meinung.

translation.en: Well, be careful.
Um, hi, asshole.
A girl?
I've been chased for the last 20 miles by some dumb skirt.
translation.de: Seit 30 km ist ein blödes Weib hinter mir her.

translation.en: Can't believe I even broke a sweat.
Back off, bitch.
Language, sir.
[chuckling] Okay.
All right, no need to get carried away, girls.
All right, I'll come.
Look, I wasn't even trying to skip bail, all right?
translation.de: Ich wollte mich nicht der Kaution entziehen.

translation.en: I just--
I got some personal shit to take care of. Getting fitted for Invisalign.
Okay, buck teeth. Put your hands on the car.
translation.de: Okay, Hasenzahn. Hände auf das Auto.

translation.en: Hold on a minute!
I've been tracking this broke-dick dog...
for three days straight.
And y'all gonna swoop in and snag my bounty, huh?
translation.de: Und ihr wollt mir mein Kopfgeld wegschnappen?

translation.en: Well, lucky for you...
I keep it professional.
Since you cornered him,
I'll kick you 20 percent of the 5K.
-They think we're bounty hunters. -I caught on to that.
-And dude's gonna give us 1000 dollars. -Fast math!
Sale math. Look, Sterling, I know you think this is sketchy or whatever,
translation.de: Schnell kalkuliert. Hör zu, wir müssen Dads Truck reparieren lassen.

translation.en: but we need that money to fix Dad's truck.
translation.de: Hör zu, wir müssen Dads Truck reparieren lassen.

translation.en: Please! Pretty please! Play along!
-Half. We should get half. -Wait, what?
Did half the work, should get half the money.
translation.de: Die Hälfte des Geldes für uns.

translation.en: -Oh. Um... Yeah, okay. -Wait, are you wussing out?
No, I'm not a wuss. -Good, neither am I. -Good.
translation.de: -Bin doch kein Feigling. -Gut, ich auch nicht.

translation.en: -Good! Great! -Awesome!
After this, can we get Chick-fil-A? I am so hungry.
translation.de: Und dann Chick-fil-A. Ich habe Kohldampf.

translation.en: Focus! And yes.
-Half. -Yes, we want half.
Y'all are cute.
That your daddy's shotgun you got there?
-This here's a Mossberg 500. -[cocks gun]
I used to be a Remington 870 kind of girl, I like the shell lifter placement of the Mossberg better.
translation.de: Ich war mal ein Remington-870-Fan, aber hier ist der Hülsenauswurf besser.

translation.en: Now, what I really prefer is this Glock 19.
translation.de: Doch meine Lieblingswaffe ist die Glock 19.

translation.en: It's so lightweight. But yes, mister, I got it from Daddy!
translation.de: Sie ist so leicht. Ein Geschenk von Daddy!

translation.en: Christmas!
Y'all a piece of work, I give you that.
translation.de: Ihr seid ganz schön harte Nüsse.

translation.en: But I don't give big cuts to folks unless they've been bringin' the heat from the beginning, okay?
translation.de: Aber große Anteile gibt's nur für vollen Einsatz von Anfang an, okay?

translation.en: And this one here, I've been tracking him for a while.
translation.de: Und ihn verfolge ich schon eine Weile.

translation.en: He's slicker than a can of oil.
translation.de: Er ist glatter als ein Aal.

translation.en: Got more tricks in his bag than Felix the... Cat! Damn it, don't you run from me.
translation.de: Er hat mehr Tricks drauf als Felix der... Verdammt, lauf nicht weg!

translation.en: Cayden! Cayden!
Goddamn it, I've been running my mouth like I'm on a talk show.
translation.de: Verdammt, ich rede wie in einer Talkshow.

translation.en: Oh, shit!
-What are we doing? -Hell if I know.
Are we, like, getting this dude?
I guess! I guess!
-So we are, yes? -Yeah! Hell yeah!
Yeah! Freeze, motherfucker!
Freeze, Jethro.
Salads. I've got to eat more salads.
[Sterling] I hope there's no ticks in this grass.
[girl] You! Stop, you!
What am I doing?
-I am not Vin Diesel. -[gunfire]
[girl screams] I got you!
I got you!
Stop the car!
Damn it!
-I got him. -All right.
Oh, my gosh, Blair, that was crazy.
-Hey, you fixed my door. -Get out!
Move!
Show me your hands, fool.
All right, new deal.
Okay, so instead of half, we're just gonna go ahead and-- and take all the money,
translation.de: Okay, statt der Hälfte nehmen wir jetzt das ganze Geld.

translation.en: since we--we got the... the perp.
translation.de: Denn wir haben den Täter gestellt.

translation.en: You know something? You're right.
You're absolutely right.
So, you two have fun wrangling this 280 pound sack of shit...
translation.de: Euch beiden viel Spaß, diesen 127-kg-Drecksack in eurem...

translation.en: -Two-forty. -Shut the hell up, Cayden!
...and delivering him to jail in your janked up truck.
Because I'm through.
Um, yeah.
Wait. We're actually... we're good with-- we're good with half.
translation.de: Wir können mit der Hälfte leben.

translation.en: Yeah, we just decided.
Who are you, anyway?
Y'all track skips around here a lot?
[clears throat] Yeah. Yeah, here and there. Yeah, sometimes-- sometimes here and other times, there.
translation.de: Ja, hier und da. Manchmal hier, manchmal da.

translation.en: What about you?
I'm new to Atlanta,
but I've been bounty huntin' just shy of ten year.
translation.de: Aber seit fast zehn Jahren Kopfgeldjäger.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we're bounty hunters, too. That I gathered.
translation.de: -Wir sind auch Kopfgeldjäger. -Das dachte ich mir.

translation.en: And also, she got laid today.
Oh, nice.
Like, full repetitive penetration.
Congratulations.
-[both] Eww. -Jesus.
But yeah, she did and I'm really proud of her.
translation.de: Und ich bin stolz auf sie.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Thank you.
Y'all are just weird.
Sorry. Sorry.
This summer, I was so blessed
translation.de: Diesen Sommer war ich so gesegnet,

translation.en: that my amazing daddy
let me and my squad
use his helicopter to hop up to our lake house
translation.de: mit seinem Helikopter zu unserem Haus am See geflogen hat,

translation.en: for a discipleship weekend.
We had such a productive time
in quiet worship and, of course, doing acts of service.
translation.de: in ruhiger Anbetung und mit guten Werken.

translation.en: We knitted sweaters for the sick, dirty babies with tiny heads in Brazil.
translation.de: Wir strickten Pullover für die kranken, schmutzigen Babys in Brasilien.

translation.en: Sweaters filled with Christ's infinite love.
translation.de: Pullover, voll mit der unendlichen Liebe Christi.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh.
[chuckles] "Abril" means "April" in [spanish accent] Brazilian.
Ooh, Abril. Wow. Okay--
My spirit is so heavy for those pequito niños.
translation.de: Mein Geist ist so schwer für diese pequito niños.

translation.en: That's a great slide show, April.
Yes, friends. Okay, but we do need to move on.
translation.de: Ja, Freunde, aber wir müssen weitermachen.

translation.en: Listen, everybody, we had some excellent submissions
translation.de: Hört mal alle zu. Wir hatten dieses Jahr tolle Bewerbungen für die Position des Fellowship-Sprechers.

translation.en: for this year's Fellowship student leader.
translation.de: Wir hatten dieses Jahr tolle Bewerbungen für die Position des Fellowship-Sprechers.

translation.en: -But when-- -[April] Bee tee dubs,
if you all want to see more pictures of me being a Christian leader,
translation.de: ihr findet mehr Bilder von mir als christliches Vorbild

translation.en: check out my Instagram,
hashtag "April helps sick kids through Christ."
translation.de: Hashtag "April hilft kranken Kindern durch Christus".

translation.en: Yes. Oh, yes, we will do that.
translation.de: Ja. Oh ja, das machen wir.

translation.en: Okay, but like I was saying, guys, we had a lot of great candidates,
translation.de: Aber wie ich schon sagte, hatten wir viele tolle Kandidaten.

translation.en: but this year, I choose the individual
translation.de: Aber dieses Jahr wähle ich die Person,

translation.en: who earnestly represents Jesus' path on this Earth, right?
translation.de: die den Weg Jesu auf dieser Erde ganz ehrlich vertritt, okay?

translation.en: I mean, this young woman makes Christ proud every single day.
translation.de: Auf diese junge Frau kann Christus jeden Tag stolz sein.

translation.en: So when you guys are struggling, right?
And you're struggling on your path with the Lord,
translation.de: und auf eurem Pfad um Gott ringt,

translation.en: I want you to look to her for guidance, okay?
translation.de: wendet euch für Orientierungshilfe an sie.

translation.en: This year's Fellowship student leader is...
Yes!
Recount!
Thank you so much. I wasn't expecting this.
translation.de: Vielen Dank. Das hätte ich nicht erwartet.

translation.en: What an honor. Um...
I'm really looking forward to this responsibility
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf diese Verantwortung,

translation.en: of helping guide you guys on your faith journeys.
translation.de: euch auf eurer Glaubensreise zu begleiten.

translation.en: Uh, lately, I've been feeling God's presence in my life more so than ever before,
translation.de: In letzter Zeit spüre ich Gottes Gegenwart in meinem Leben mehr als je zuvor,

translation.en: and yeah, I just feel Christ inside me.
translation.de: und ja, ich spüre Christus in mir.

translation.en: But not like inside me,
like, um, like not like "inside" inside me,
like, just... um, if... you know what I mean, right?
translation.de: Ihr wisst, was ich meine, oder?

translation.en: [woman] It was a great meeting, everybody.
Oh, I love you.
-I know. -[chuckles] That's crazy. Congratulations, I'm so proud of you.
translation.de: Verrückt, oder? Glückwunsch. Ich bin stolz auf dich.

translation.en: Oh. Thanks. Thanks. Um...
Uh... I'll see you--
I'll see you at lunch.
-Yeah, at lunch. Yeah. See ya. -Okay.
Wait a minute.
-Sterling, congratulations! -[chuckles]
Oh, I'm so looking forward to working with you this year.
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf unsere Zusammenarbeit.

translation.en: We are going to have so much fun!
And I just know you'll bring something extra special to this position, huh?
translation.de: Und ich weiß, du bringst etwas Besonderes mit.

translation.en: Thanks, Ellen. It's an honor. Oh, I know it is.
translation.de: -Danke, Ellen. Es ist eine Ehre. -Ich weiß.

translation.en: Okay. Well, we got the lock-in coming up.
So, I'll need your full attention on that.
And then why don't we just plan to meet sometime soon and discuss next week's devotional reading.
translation.de: Und wir müssen bald die Andachtstexte für nächste Woche auswählen.

translation.en: -Okay. -It's always good to start the year off with abstinence.
translation.de: Es ist immer gut, das Jahr mit Abstinenz zu beginnen.

translation.en: Abstinence as a devotional topic, is that right?
Ooh, call the police, Blair!
Rocking boots!
[laughs] You know, Jesus was a rebel too.
Yeah. I heard that he saw Nine Inch Nails 20 times on the Downward Spiral tour.
translation.de: Er hat Nine Inch Nails auf der Downward-Spiral-Tournee 20 Mal gesehen.

translation.en: You have a great imagination, Blair.
translation.de: Du hast eine tolle Fantasie, Blair!

translation.en: It is beautiful.
I love you girls. Text me if you need me.
translation.de: Ich mag euch beide. Simst, wenn ihr mich braucht.

translation.en: I can't be Fellowship leader.
What, why? It's, like, your whole thing.
translation.de: Was, warum? Das ist doch genau dein Ding.

translation.en: I can't lead a Christian Community if I've... you know?
translation.de: Es geht nicht, weil... du weißt schon.

translation.en: Had sex with your long-term boyfriend?
translation.de: Weil du Sex mit deinem Freund hattest?

translation.en: -Who cares? -Everyone cares.
But what I mean is, do you think you did anything wrong?
translation.de: Ich meine, hast du etwas falsch gemacht?

translation.en: Not any more wrong than it was wrong that I lied about farting in the car this morning.
translation.de: Nicht mehr als meine Lüge heute Morgen über die Fürze im Auto.

translation.en: A sin's a sin. You know? If you repent, then you're forgiven in the eyes of the Lord, so...
translation.de: Sünde bleibt Sünde. Wenn man bereut, vergibt einem Gott.

translation.en: Right, so what's the issue?
I feel like a liar.
If Ellen knew I was sexually active, then forget student leader,
translation.de: Wenn Ellen wüsste, dass ich sexuell aktiv bin,

translation.en: she'd kick me out of Fellowship altogether.
translation.de: dann wär's das mit dem Fellowship für mich.

translation.en: So, you're either an honest slut or a lying slut?
translation.de: Also entweder eine ehrliche oder eine lügende Schlampe?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Hey, at least with Fellowship, you have something impressive to put on your college apps.
translation.de: Mit dem Fellowship hättest du etwas Beeindruckendes fürs College.

translation.en: Be a lying slut.
Congratulations on Fellowship, Sterling.
Thank you, April.
I really thought it was going to be me,
translation.de: Ich dachte, sie würde mich nehmen.

translation.en: but I'm glad it wasn't because I'm going to be so busy this year
translation.de: Zum Glück nicht, da ich dieses Jahr so viel zu tun habe.

translation.en: with other extracurriculars like Young Republicans, Forensics,
translation.de: Außerschulisches wie die jungen Republikaner, das Rhetorik-Turnier,

translation.en: Latin club, the "Straight-Straight" Alliance.
I think the straights are already aligned.
Yo, B!
That's really good for you, April.
-Yeah, it is. -[kissing loudly]
-Sorry, Sterling. -Jeez.
That is my bad, man.
[chuckles] She, like, totally forgives you.
Oh, thanks.
Yeah, you think I wouldn't help a fellow...
Christian?
[Jennings] All right, well... -I gotta go to Gym. -[Blair moans]
I will see you later. All right, dude?
-Okay, dude. -[Jennings chuckles]
Wait, Jennings. I have Gym, too.
translation.de: Warte, Jennings. Ich habe auch Sport.

translation.en: She just took the condom wrapper.
How was your weekend?
Did you hang out with Sterling and Luke at all?
translation.de: Hast du mit Sterling und Luke abgehangen?

translation.en: Uh, why are you talking to me? [chuckles]
She's gonna tell the whole fricking school.
translation.de: Sie erzählt es der ganzen Schule.

translation.en: She can't prove anything.
Does she have to?
People's faith in gossip is stronger than their faith in the Almighty.
translation.de: Menschen glauben mehr an Klatsch als an Gott.

translation.en: Hello, girls.
Chloe, baby. How's my girl?
translation.de: Chloe, mein Baby. Wie geht's meinem Mädchen?

translation.en: Brownies, fresh out of the oven. I call corners.
[woman] Blair, I would stick to just one.
translation.de: Blair, nimm lieber nur ein Stück.

translation.en: You know, sugar makes you break out and lacrosse season's coming up.
translation.de: Zucker macht Pickel, und die Lacrosse-Saison beginnt.

translation.en: You want to look your best. Oh, great point, Mom.
translation.de: -Du willst gut aussehen. -Du hast recht, Mom.

translation.en: Good looks are vital to a successful career in sports.
translation.de: Gutes Aussehen ist für eine Sportkarriere wichtig.

translation.en: Just ask Michael Phelps.
Michael Phelps is kind of cute.
Andre the Giant.
How was school?
-Lame. -Good.
Sterling got Fellowship leader.
Baby, yes!
[man] What's all this hollerin'?
-Oh, Sterling got Fellowship leader. -[gasps]
Way to go, princess!
I was Fellowship leader back in high school.
Did I mention that I killed it today in lax practice, like a total badass?
translation.de: Ich war heute im Lacrosse-Training scheiße gut.

translation.en: -Language. Bad. -But--
That is fantastic, Blair. What'd you do? Did you give those attackers the old "Wesley check"?
translation.de: Fantastisch. Was hast du getan? Den alten Wesley-Bodycheck eingesetzt?

translation.en: -Yes, sir. You know it. -[man chuckles]
I'm so proud of my girls.
Hey, I called the corners!
Okay, just texted Bowser that we're on our way.
translation.de: Ich habe Bowser gesimst, dass wir kommen.

translation.en: Honestly, Blair, is there not another way we could get the money?
translation.de: Gibt es keinen anderen Weg, um an das Geld zu kommen?

translation.en: Is prostitution legal in the state of Georgia if the prostitute is super into it?
translation.de: Ist Prostitution in Georgia legal, wenn die Prostituierte voll drauf steht?

translation.en: I'm serious.
Okay, we're going to pick up the 2,500,
get Dad's truck fixed before the weekend, and then never think about this again.
translation.de: reparieren Dads Truck vorm Wochenende und denken nie wieder dran.

translation.en: But, what if 2,500 doesn't cover it? Can't you buy a whole new car for that?
translation.de: -Was, wenn 2.500 nicht reichen? -Das ist genug für ein neues Auto.

translation.en: We can't take the Volt.
What kind of bounty hunters drive a hybrid?
translation.de: Was für Kopfgeldjäger fahren einen Hybrid?

translation.en: Um, the kind that doesn't want Atlanta to be waterfront property by the year 2030.
translation.de: Solche, die nicht wollen, dass Atlanta 2030 eine Küstenstadt ist.

translation.en: Oh, come on, let's just take the truck.
I'd rather Dad notice that it's gone than notice it's--
translation.de: Besser, er ist weg, als dass Dad sieht...

translation.en: -Completely F'ed? -Exactly.
Come on, you dirty old hippie. Let's go!
translation.de: Los, du alter Dreckshippie. Auf geht's!

translation.en: You know, you're technically three minutes older than me.
translation.de: Du bist eigentlich drei Minuten älter als ich.

translation.en: And I'm not a hippie!
Here they come.
Hey, Cath, could you get the bathroom for me, too, please?
translation.de: Hey, Cath, wisch bitte auch in der Toilette.

translation.en: Aye-aye, Cap'n.
Okay, we're not on a ship. Just let her be happy, Bowser. Just let her be happy.
translation.de: Wir fahren nicht zur See. Lass sie doch gut gelaunt sein, Bowser.

translation.en: Is this your "job" job? I thought you were a bounty-hunter.
translation.de: Ist das dein Job? Nicht Kopfgeldjäger?

translation.en: Can I have a vanilla with extra gummy bears?
Wait. You. Don't knock my side-hustle, kid.
translation.de: Moment, mach meinen Nebenjob nicht schlecht.

translation.en: Trust me. You never know.
translation.de: Ich sag dir, man weiß nie.

translation.en: And yes, you can have extra gummy bears, that'll be an extra 75 cents.
translation.de: Und du kannst Gummibärchen haben. Das kostet 75 Cent mehr.

translation.en: Do you sing if I tip? No, I will not sing.
translation.de: -Singst du für Trinkgeld? -Nein, ich singe nicht!

translation.en: [Blair] You're no fun.
-What is--? -Hey! What you waitin' on?
Come on.
You, uh... got the cash?
Yup.
Turn around, please.
Thank you.
All right.
-[ringtone on cell phone] -Oh, shit.
Yeah. Go for Bowser.
No. No. No. No. Yolanda.
Don't give it to that bitch-ass, Terrance. I'll find him.
translation.de: Nimm nicht Terrance, den Mistkerl. Ich werde ihn finden.

translation.en: I know.
The Men's Parlor. I know.
Because I'll find--
You heard what I said, didn't you?
[whispering] Shit.
Hey. Put that back. What are you doing? Here you go.
translation.de: Leg das sofort wieder hin. Bitte sehr.

translation.en: Count it, Sterling. [clears throat]
-That's great. Thank you. It's good. -All right. Good doing business with you.
translation.de: -Toll. Danke. -Gut. Hat mich gefreut, meine Damen.

translation.en: -As the old saying goes, "Bye." -Uh...
Yeah.
You look... manly.
Oily... Uh...
Vehicular-ly inclined.
Anyway, do you know how much it might cost us to get that fixed? Roughly?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie viel es uns kosten würde, das zu reparieren? Ungefähr?

translation.en: Oily, huh? Yeah.
Well, as a man who's crashed many cars,
translation.de: Als jemand, der schon zahlreiche Unfälle hatte...

translation.en: I'd say you'd probably run yourself about 5K worth of damage here.
translation.de: ...sage ich mal, ihr habt hier einen Schaden von rund 5.000.

translation.en: Yeah.
Um... Do you have any more jobs?
Ah, jeez, if I had any more jobs,
if I had more jobs-- Look...
translation.de: Wenn ich Jobs hätte... Hört mal.

translation.en: I like you girls. I do.
You're fast as hell.
You run like a deer. It was amazing.
translation.de: Du läufst wie ein Reh. Das war toll.

translation.en: And you, you're a freakishly good shot.
But I've got rent to pay. I can't split my rewards on folks I can nab on my own, see?
translation.de: Aber ich muss meine Miete zahlen und kann meinen Lohn nicht teilen.

translation.en: Hey, we get it.
Yeah, well, getting it is half the battle, ah?
translation.de: Ja. Na ja, verstehen ist die halbe Miete.

translation.en: So, what do you want to do now?
Go to the Men's Parlor?
That secret club of which we know the exact location?
translation.de: Zum Geheimklub, dessen genaue Lage wir kennen?

translation.en: Hey, uh, what's the address over there? The address alone won't get you very far.
translation.de: -Hey, wie lautet die Adresse? -Die Adresse allein reicht nicht.

translation.en: -And why is that? -You need us to get in it.
It-- um-- It's in this country club and they only cater to this specific clientele, it's--
translation.de: Er ist im Country Club, der ist nur für ein bestimmtes Klientel.

translation.en: -White people. -Blair.
What? It's true!
I don't think it's written in stone, but...
translation.de: Ist wohl nicht in Stein gemeißelt...

translation.en: actually, it--it might be.
So, unfortunately these places have some outdated policies that don't--
translation.de: Leider herrschen an solchen Orten veralterte Regeln,

translation.en: Okay. Enough with the Black history, Reverend Al Sharpton. I get it.
translation.de: -die nicht... -Okay. Genug Geschichte, Reverend Al Sharpton. Das sind Rassisten.

translation.en: They're racist.
translation.de: Genug Geschichte, Reverend Al Sharpton. Das sind Rassisten.

translation.en: -Right. -Yes.
Yeah, so you can have the address for,
translation.de: Also du könntest die Adresse bekommen. Für...

translation.en: I don't know, say... a hundred,
or you could have personal whitey escorts
translation.de: Oder du könntest persönliche weiße Begleiterinnen haben.

translation.en: -for three thou-- -Five.
Five thousand dollars.
If you deliver me John Stevens, y'all will get paid.
translation.de: Wenn ihr mir John Stevens liefert, werdet ihr bezahlt.

translation.en: John Stevens, dude.
It can't be April's dad. There's gotta be a bajillion John Stevenses.
translation.de: Nicht Aprils Vater. Es gibt Zigmillionen John Stevens.

translation.en: Bajillion John Stevenses that belong to Men's Parlor?
April's dad is the creep on our eighth grade trip to Jekyll Island that said I was developing nicely.
translation.de: Ihr Vater sagte auf unserer Klassenfahrt, ich würde mich "hübsch entwickeln".

translation.en: Oh, barf. Yes.
I'd love to arrest him and watch April squirm.
translation.de: Er sollte vor Aprils Augen verhaftet werden.

translation.en: Are you wearing my Savage X Fenty bralette again? I hate you. You'll stink it up with your smelly boobs.
translation.de: Trägst du meinen Savage-X-Fenty-BH? Er wird nach deinen Titten stinken.

translation.en: Now's not the time.
Cool. We know John Stevens.
Say again.
Oh, yeah, we brought him in before.
translation.de: Wir haben ihn schon mal geschnappt.

translation.en: What did the old boy do this time?
translation.de: Was hat der Typ diesmal getan?

translation.en: Solicitation and battery. Real pillar of his community.
translation.de: Versuchte Anstiftung und Körperverletzung. Ein angesehener Mann.

translation.en: Skipped bail last week, even. Having a meeting tonight at The Men's Parlor at 6:00.
translation.de: Er verstieß gegen Kautionsauflagen. Wir treffen uns um sechs im Men's Parlour.

translation.en: My bail bondsman. My bail bondswoman...
translation.de: Mein Kautionsvermittler. Meine Kautionsvermittlerin hat einen Tipp erhalten.

translation.en: My bail bondsperson got a tip.
translation.de: Meine Kautionsvermittlerin hat einen Tipp erhalten.

translation.en: Dope.
Let's ride.
-Dope. Let's ride. -Hey! My car.
Well, this is some Django shit.
Hey, Trevor. Hey, Miles.
Oh, uh, you guys going to be parking today? No. He's just dropping us off.
translation.de: -Parken Sie heute? -Nein! Er bring uns nur.

translation.en: Park down by the service entrance, download Fruit Ninja.
translation.de: Parke am Personaleingang und lade Fruit Ninja herunter.

translation.en: We'll be back with your guy.
What the hell is a "fruit ninja"?
I'm really hoping you have a plan.
translation.de: -Ich hoffe, du hast einen Plan. -Keinen Plan, mehr eine Idee.

translation.en: Not so much a plan as like a general idea...ish...ment.
translation.de: -Ich hoffe, du hast einen Plan. -Keinen Plan, mehr eine Idee. Mehr oder weniger.

translation.en: Care to enlighten me?
Okay, how about... we walk into The Men's Parlor like a couple of Lara Crofts.
translation.de: Okay, wir sollten wie Lara Croft in den Men's Parlour reinspazieren.

translation.en: And then we slip some of my melatonin into Mr. Stevens' drink,
translation.de: Wir mischen was von meinem Melatonin in Mr. Stevens Drink,

translation.en: like James Bond and then we grab him--
Or we can clock him in the head with this pistol? You brought a pistol?
translation.de: -Oder ein Schlag mit der Pistole... -Du hast eine dabei?

translation.en: [woman] Hello, girls...
Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Jenson. Y'all are looking sharp.
translation.de: Mr. und Mrs. Jenson. Sie sehen schick aus.

translation.en: Thank you.
I love that nail color, Mrs. Jenson. It's like skin color, but prettier.
translation.de: Tolle Nagelfarbe, Mrs. Jenson. Wie hautfarben, nur hübscher.

translation.en: Y'all are too dang sweet. Tell your mother and daddy we said hello.
translation.de: Ihr seid zu süß. Bestellt euren Eltern Grüße von uns.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am, and see you Sunday morning bright and early.
Oh, you will.
Aren't they precious? I wish Frank would date one of them.
translation.de: So süß. Unser Frank sollte mit einer der beiden ausgehen.

translation.en: I wasn't going to meet up with a bounty hunter unarmed. That's just common sense.
translation.de: Unbewaffnet in so was reinzugehen, wäre unvernünftig gewesen.

translation.en: Stranger danger.
[scoffs] He's not here. It's past six o'clock--
translation.de: Nach sechs, und er ist nicht hier.

translation.en: Hey. What are you two doing in here?
Come on, get over here.
-[Blair scoffs] -[Miles] Quick.
Are you two crazy?
That's The "Men's" Parlour. Neither of you are mens.
translation.de: Das ist der "Men's Parlour". Ihr seid beide keine Männer.

translation.en: Y-- Yeah, obviously.
But, I don't see a Women's Parlour here.
translation.de: Aber... ...ich sehe hier keinen Women's Parlour.

translation.en: So, we're here in protest. Okay?
♪ Show me what a Women's Parlour looks like ♪
translation.de: Zeig mir, wie ein Women's Parlour aussieht

translation.en: ♪ This is what a Women's Parlour looks like! ♪
translation.de: So sieht ein Women's Parlour aus!

translation.en: -♪ Show me what a Women's-- ♪ -[interrupting]
Uh-- Uh-- We're looking for John Stevens.
We heard he had a meeting. Know where we can find him?
translation.de: Er sollte hier sein. Sagst du uns, wo er ist?

translation.en: If I told you, I would lose my job.
translation.de: Dann würde ich meinen Job verlieren.

translation.en: You know how weird this place is about secrets and traditions.
translation.de: Geheimnisse und Traditionen sind hier superwichtig.

translation.en: Miles, we, uh... really...
need your help...
here. So...
All right, he's in the humidor.
It's where a group of guys called The Bourbon Club meet.
Great. Where is it?
-It's around that corner, but-- -Okay. Thanks, Miles.
Okay, we'll see you later.
Did you see that? I, like, totally seduced him.
translation.de: Hast du das gesehen? Ich habe ihn total verführt.

translation.en: [whispering] Focus! I think it's this.
There's nothing here. Well...
thanks for nothing, Miles.
What are y'all in the mood for? We got top shelf or... hell, we can all slum it with Beam.
translation.de: Wonach steht euch der Sinn? Was Teures oder einfach nur Jim Beam?

translation.en: [man] Find that single barrel we like so much from Pigeon Forge. Mm.
translation.de: Den Single Barrel von Pigeon Forge, den wir so mögen.

translation.en: Anyway, now y'all gonna have to believe me when I tell y'all...
translation.de: Jetzt müsst ihr mir glauben, wenn ich sage,

translation.en: -that was Gerald. -[man] And now you're tellin' fibs.
[man 3] No, he's not. Girl was there, and the cops were coming
translation.de: -Tut er nicht. -Das Mädchen war da, die Bullen kamen.

translation.en: and John happened to be at the motel bar.
translation.de: Und John war in der Motelbar.

translation.en: [chuckles] Gerald asked him to take the fall. Gerald's got rage issues.
translation.de: -Gerald bat ihn, den Kopf hinzuhalten. -Er wird schnell aggressiv.

translation.en: Saying you're the one who beat up a whore is a damn big sacrifice.
translation.de: So zu tun, als hätte man selbst die Hure verprügelt. Wow!

translation.en: He's been my business partner for 18 years. Wife's in hospice care.
translation.de: Wir sind seit 18 Jahren Geschäftspartner. Seine Frau ist im Hospiz.

translation.en: Ovarian cancer's got her any day now.
I couldn't let Gerald ruin himself in her eyes,
translation.de: Gerald soll sich vor ihr nicht blamieren.

translation.en: so when she passes, he'll confess.
translation.de: Nach ihrem Tod wird er gestehen.

translation.en: And until then, I'm hidin' out.
translation.de: Und bis dahin verstecke ich mich.

translation.en: [man 1] Dadgum, you're a good man, John. [man 2] A lot better than I'd have done, that's for damn sure.
translation.de: Du bist ein guter Mann, John. Viel besser, als ich es wäre.

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, we know.
[man 2] Hey, I found it. There it is.
-[man 1] Finally. -[men chuckle]
[John] Bring that on in. Mmm.
It's looking good.
Holy shit.
Mr. Stevens was just protecting his fuckboy partner.
translation.de: Mr. Stevens beschützt nur seinen Partner.

translation.en: We can't bring him in. Dude, we need the money.
translation.de: -Wir könnten ihn nicht mitnehmen. -Wir brauchen aber Kohle.

translation.en: He didn't do it, it would be wrong. You know this!
translation.de: Er ist unschuldig. Du weißt das!

translation.en: You can be very un-fun sometimes!
translation.de: Manchmal macht es echt keinen Spaß mit dir.

translation.en: Get out of here! Oh, peach! [chuckles]
I'm a fruit ninja.
He wasn't there.
Goddamn it, I thought you said you knew what you were doin'.
translation.de: Verdammt, ich dachte, ihr wüsstet, was ihr tut.

translation.en: We thought that you said that you knew what you were doing.
translation.de: Wir dachten, du wüsstest, was du tust.

translation.en: Yeah, Bowser, so you must of... had some misinformation.
translation.de: Ja, Bowser. Du bist wohl einer Fehlinformation aufgesessen.

translation.en: Shhhit.
Misinformation.
Oh, that's awesome.
That's...
That's, that's it.
That was amazing.
Mmm. I love you.
I love you.
-Oh. Hey, babe. -Hey.
How was your day? It was really good. Did you have a good day?
translation.de: -Wie war dein Tag? -Echt gut. Und deiner?

translation.en: I had such a good day.
-Okay, yeah... See ya. -Do you--?
-Okay. -See ya. Uh, I go-- I got golf.
You totally just boned. [sighs] We made love.
You mean you boned, but slower?
That must have been so intense.
It was kind of awesome.
Oh, my God. When he's--
If my--
If I didn't know my fate at this school rested in her cold little condom-wrapper-grabbing hands,
translation.de: Wenn mein Schicksal hier nicht in ihren diebischen Händen läge,

translation.en: I'd feel bad for April about her dad. I hate her dumb bitch face but... yeah.
translation.de: -täte mir April wegen ihres Vaters leid. -Ich hasse ihr dämliches Gesicht, aber ja.

translation.en: If his business partner doesn't confess, does he have to go to jail for him?
translation.de: Wenn der Geschäftspartner nicht gesteht, muss er ins Gefängnis?

translation.en: She'd have one more thing to pray about, that's for sure.
translation.de: Sie hätte noch einen Grund, um zu beten.

translation.en: Shit. Shit. Shit.
translation.de: IHR 2 SEID ERLEDIGT. KOMMT SOFORT NACH HAUSE. LG, MOM

translation.en: Check your phone. Shit!
-[groans] -[cell phone bleeps]
You don't have to sign who it's from.
Disappointment is beyond what your father and I feel right now.
translation.de: Euer Vater und ich sind mehr als enttäuscht von euch.

translation.en: -We trusted you girls-- -The Volt is so small.
Oh, you do not interrupt me when I'm talking to you--! You do not interrupt your mother.
translation.de: -Unterbrich mich nicht. -Ja, unterbrecht eure Mutter nicht.

translation.en: Took your father's truck without permission. You treated it like trash
translation.de: Einfach den Truck zu nehmen. Ihr habt noch nicht mal aufgepasst!

translation.en: and what's more, you didn't even tell us about crashing it.
translation.de: Und dann habt ihr den Unfall verheimlicht!

translation.en: You were dishonest and you were irresponsible.
That's right.
We've decided that you two will have to pay for the repairs.
translation.de: Wir haben beschlossen, dass ihr die Reparatur selbst bezahlen müsst.

translation.en: That's right, you'll have to get jobs.
translation.de: Genau, ihr werdet einen Job finden müssen.

translation.en: [man] And if you can't handle that,
then we will fix the truck with the money we spend sending you to Willingham.
translation.de: reparieren wir den Truck mit eurem Schulgeld für Willingham.

translation.en: Oh, that's good.
See if y'all can handle public school. [woman] Is that what y'all want? Public school?
translation.de: -Dann geht ihr auf die öffentliche Schule. -Wollt ihr das?

translation.en: Where the principal wears blue jeans,
and the classrooms are just one long bench and a chalkboard on wheels.
translation.de: Wo Klassenzimmer nur eine Bank und eine Tafel auf Rädern haben?

translation.en: -No, ma'am. -Maybe.
Young lady, don't you get smart with me.
translation.de: Junge Dame, sei nicht so neunmalklug.

translation.en: Now, are we understood?
[both] Yes, ma'am. [woman] Well, what are you waiting for? Go.
Go!
[sighs] If we leave right now, we can still make our court. Ooh.
translation.de: Wir schaffen es noch zum Tennistermin.

translation.en: -[rock music playing] -That's good good good good good good.
-That's good. -[knocking]
-Go away! -Hey.
Or come in.
We need work, Bowser.
And I need a big house with a white picket fence and Tawny Kitaen in the back, cooking me up some pancakes.
translation.de: Und ich brauche ein großes Haus mit Garten und Tawny Kitaen in der Küche.

translation.en: -That's what I need. -We're serious.
-Yeah. -Oh, I can tell.
Well, I gave you a chance and you didn't catch the skip,
translation.de: Ihr hattet die Chance, habt den Kerl aber nicht geschnappt.

translation.en: so it doesn't sound promising to me.
You can use us. We have a lot of power in the community.
translation.de: Wir können mit unserm Einfluss in der Gemeinde helfen.

translation.en: Like, the rich people community.
[chuckling] Yeah, okay, then.
Find me John Stevens.
You know, solicitation of a prostitute and battery,
that just doesn't sound like John Stevens. Are you sure that the charges are right?
translation.de: klingt nicht wie John Stevens. Bist du sicher?

translation.en: I would hate to put him away if he didn't really do it.
translation.de: Wir wollen ihn nicht fälschlich festnehmen.

translation.en: Hold it right there.
A bounty hunter catches a guy and collects the bounty.
translation.de: Kopfgeldjäger fangen einen Kerl und kassieren.

translation.en: -Whether he did it-- -Or she...
Whether he or she did it is no concern of mine.
translation.de: Ob er oder sie schuldig sind, interessiert mich nicht.

translation.en: And if you're real bounty hunters, it shouldn't be any of yours, either.
translation.de: Als echte Kopfgeldjäger sollte es euch auch nicht interessieren.

translation.en: -He knows we're not bounty hunters. -Maybe he doesn't, so just chill.
translation.de: -Er weiß, wir sind nicht echt. -Oder nicht, also chill.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, I can do that.
Just soooo chill.
-Just super chill. -Chill.
So chill.
[sniffs] I know you're not really bounty hunters. -Aw, shit. -Aw, shoot.
I mean, "Come again, dog?"
I ran your plates, kid.
You're the teenage daughters of Anderson and Deborah Wesley
translation.de: Die Töchter von Anderson und Deborah Wesley,

translation.en: of 495 Albemarle Circle.
Before that you were at 716 Margaret Mitchell.
By the way, your mama has six unpaid parking tickets.
translation.de: Eure Mom hat sechs unbezahlte Strafzettel.

translation.en: You post on TikTok 4.2 times a week.
translation.de: Ihr postet 4,2 Mal die Woche auf TikTok.

translation.en: -Should I go on? -TikTok is an art.
How do you know all of that?
Because I'm good at my job,
which is why I was going to let you get away with this until you deliver me John Stevens.
translation.de: und wollte euch in Ruhe lassen, bis ihr mir John Stevens bringt.

translation.en: He's a big payday, but obviously that's beyond your scope.
translation.de: Für ihn kriege ich viel Geld, aber für euch ist es 'ne Nummer zu groß.

translation.en: But you said yourself we're good at this stuff.
translation.de: Du hast selbst gesagt, wir machen es gut.

translation.en: Did I really say that?
-Yes. -I don't--
Okay, but it just doesn't make sense for me, girls.
translation.de: Es rechnet sich nicht für mich, Mädels.

translation.en: It'd be like I was babysitting. [chuckles] And who wants to see me with a baby?
translation.de: Es ist wie babysitten. Wer will mich mit einem Baby sehen?

translation.en: Do you understand? Hell, come on.
Feel free to come by here any time to say hi. Because y'all crack me up.
translation.de: Kommt gerne mal wieder vorbei, ihr bringt mich zum Lachen.

translation.en: Don't arrest John Stevens. We have inside information. -He's innocent. -Yeah.
translation.de: Lass John Stevens in Ruhe. Er ist unschuldig. Wir haben Infos.

translation.en: Inside information, hm?
All right, let's see.
Take a look at that. Security footage from the night of the arrest.
translation.de: Schaut euch das Überwachungsvideo aus der Nacht der Verhaftung an.

translation.en: [Sterling] Oh, my gosh, it's totally him.
This is bonkerballs.
Mr. Stevens did it, that little lying piece of shit.
-He beat up that poor woman. -We should have known.
translation.de: -Er hat sie verprügelt. -Hätten wir wissen müssen.

translation.en: He just happened to be at the bar? Motels don't have bars.
translation.de: Er war in der Bar? Motels haben keine Bars.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. God, you're so smart. It's kind of annoying.
translation.de: Richtig. Du bist so clever. Es ist richtig nervig.

translation.en: Okay, we need to find him. Hey, text Miles and see if he's at The Men's Parlour.
translation.de: Wir müssen ihn finden. Sims Miles, ob er im Men's Parlour ist.

translation.en: Good idea.
He said he can't tell me.
translation.de: KANN ICH DIR NICHT SAGEN. -Er kann's nicht sagen. -Sag ihm, du gehst mit ihm aus.

translation.en: -Tell him you'll go on a date with him. -[groans]
translation.de: -Er kann's nicht sagen. -Sag ihm, du gehst mit ihm aus.

translation.en: He's not there.
translation.de: Er ist nicht da. WIE WÄR'S MIT FREITAG?

translation.en: Please!
There's no way he's hiding out at home. How the hell are we gonna find out where he went?
translation.de: Er versteckt sich sicher nicht zu Hause. Wie sollen wir ihn finden?

translation.en: I might have an idea.
You might have an idea or actually have an idea.
No, I have an idea. Let me have my cool, ominous moment. Okay, sorry.
translation.de: -Lass mich den coolen Moment genießen. -Okay, sorry.

translation.en: It's just not cool.
Hey, April, we need to talk to you.
The pressures of Fellowship too much already? I wish I could help.
translation.de: Ist der Fellowship-Druck schon zu groß? Wenn ich dir nur helfen könnte.

translation.en: Oh, bless your heart. Uh, no, we met with your daddy this week,
translation.de: Das rührt mich sehr. Nein, wir haben deinen Dad getroffen.

translation.en: and he so graciously offered to sponsor our field trip to the soup kitchen.
translation.de: Und er wollte unseren Ausflug zur Suppenküche sponsern.

translation.en: What a sweet man.
Yeah, the problem is that funding is due tomorrow
and we can't seem to find him. Do you know where he is?
translation.de: Aber wo ist er? Weiß du das?

translation.en: You met with him earlier this week?
Yeah, Monday. Lovely office.
Gorgeous interior design.
That's funny, because he took his helicopter to Hilton Head
translation.de: Komisch, denn er ist vor zehn Tagen mit dem Helikopter zum Golfen nach Hilton Head geflogen.

translation.en: for a golf retreat ten days ago.
translation.de: mit dem Helikopter zum Golfen nach Hilton Head geflogen.

translation.en: -Ooh. -Okay... what?
I'll explain later.
Oh. Sorry, did I say this past Monday? I meant the Monday before that. I'm-- [chuckles]
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich meinte den Montag davor.

translation.en: -It's been a long day... -Yeah.
...and yeah, my brain's like melted into a puddle, and, yeah.
translation.de: Ich kann kaum noch geradeaus denken.

translation.en: I don't know what you little tramps think you're up to, but I know you're lying.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, was ihr Miststücke vorhabt, aber ich weiß, dass ihr lügt.

translation.en: You do not want to mess with me, honey.
translation.de: Leg dich ja nicht mit mir an, Schätzchen.

translation.en: Just need the money to continue to spread Christ's love.
translation.de: Wir brauchen das Geld, um Christi Liebe zu verbreiten.

translation.en: -No need to get worked up about it. -Stay away from my family.
translation.de: -Reg dich nicht auf. -Lass meine Familie in Ruhe.

translation.en: Have a blessed night. Oh, you too, sweetie.
Read the room, Hannah B. For the love of God, read the room.
translation.de: Mann, Hannah B, das passte jetzt gar nicht.

translation.en: I wonder what Ellen would say if she knew
translation.de: Was würde Ellen sagen, wenn sie wüsste, dass du,

translation.en: that while I was home making care packages for homeless teens,
translation.de: während ich zu Hause Hilfspakete für obdachlose Teenager schnürte,

translation.en: her star Fellowship leader was spreading her legs for Luke Creswell
translation.de: als Fellowship-Schülersprecherin die Beine für Luke Creswell breitgemacht hast?

translation.en: in the senior lot. Gosh.
What would the whole school... say?
translation.de: Was würde die ganze Schule sagen?

translation.en: Hoarder.
It was fun while it lasted, Sterl, huh? Our little life of badassery?
translation.de: Es war doch eine schöne Zeit, Sterl, unser Leben als knallharte Heldinnen?

translation.en: Just would have been nice if it ended after we got the money to pay back Mom and Dad.
translation.de: Hätten wir doch nur Mom and Dad das Geld zurückzahlen können.

translation.en: Maybe we can get jobs at that other Yogurtopia on Peachtree.
translation.de: Vielleicht gibt's beim anderen Yogurtopia Jobs.

translation.en: Might not suck so hard if we get the same shift.
"Hashtag April helps sick kids through Christ."
translation.de: "Hashtag April hilft kranken Kindern durch Christus."

translation.en: What? That's the hashtag of April's discipleship weekend.
Where she took that stupid helicopter to her lake house.
translation.de: Wo sie mit dem Hubschrauber zum Haus am See flog.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Yeah.
I bet he is hiding out there.
But how do we find the address? Well, if April geo-tagged the photos, then--
translation.de: -Wie finden wir es? -Wenn Aprils Fotos Geo-Tags haben...

translation.en: [groans] Except she blocked me.
And her dad's account is private.
translation.de: Und ihr Dad hat ein privates Konto.

translation.en: Unless...
Take one of me like this.
Sterling take-- Sterling.
Ster-- Sterling! What are you doing?
Fake account, sexy profile pics,
send a follow request and...
And now we wait. Yeah.
Top five... hottest guys at Willingham.
translation.de: Die fünf heißesten Typen an der Willingham.

translation.en: Besides Luke and Jennings? [scoffs] Yeah. Of-- Of course...
-Um... -Okay.
The first one's easy, obviously.
-Owen Caruthers. -Yeah. Chase Holten.
-What? No! -Eww.
Owen's, like, spooky hot.
Chase is, like, boring and hot.
I like his hair-swoopy thing and he looks like he'd be a really good cuddler.
translation.de: Ich mag seine Haartolle und er kann bestimmt gut kuscheln.

translation.en: Owen looks like he's going to die of some old-timey disease.
translation.de: Owen stirbt bestimmt an einer Alterskrankheit.

translation.en: Yeah, I love that.
-[cell phone chimes] -Hey.
Oh, dang, that was fast.
translation.de: @JOHNSTEVENSUGA73 HAT DIE ANFRAGE ANGENOMMEN -Das ging aber schnell. -Er steht auf Titten.

translation.en: [chuckles] Clearly a boob man.
translation.de: -Das ging aber schnell. -Er steht auf Titten.

translation.en: Okay, we have the address. Let's go!
translation.de: Wir haben die Adresse. Los geht's!

translation.en: Wait wait wait wait.... What about Fellowship?
translation.de: Warte. Was ist mit dem Fellowship?

translation.en: What about April ruining your Christian reputation?
translation.de: April könnte deinen christlichen Ruf ruinieren.

translation.en: He beat up a prostitute. Letting John Stevens walk around free of judgment?
translation.de: Er hat eine Prostituierte verprügelt. John Stevens nicht zu belangen...

translation.en: That just wouldn't be the Christian thing to do.
Christ for the win!
Badassery reinstated.
It's coming up.
He's not in the den. Go.
translation.de: Er ist nicht im Arbeitszimmer. Weiter!

translation.en: Dude...
Look. Look.
[Sterling] That must be him.
We're straight-up detectives.
It's so baller. I feel baller.
translation.de: -Wie die Gangster. -Ich fühl mich wie ein Gangster.

translation.en: Adventure kind of makes me horny. Everything makes you horny.
translation.de: -Abenteuer machen mich geil. -Alles macht dich geil.

translation.en: Come on.
-[Blair and Sterling grunt] -Dear Lord!
I want to say, Jessica?
[chuckling] What are you ladies doing here?
You know, you're lucky I didn't use my gun. That's okay. We'll use ours.
translation.de: -Zum Glück zog ich meine Waffe nicht. -Schon gut. Wir nehmen unsere.

translation.en: Prostitute beater!
The hell are you doing?
-I'll have you arrested. What the hell? -[gun cocks]
Actually, Mr. Stevens, it's kind of the opposite.
translation.de: Mr. Stevens, das Gegenteil ist der Fall.

translation.en: We're having you arrested. -We'll have you arrested. -What?
translation.de: -Wir lassen Sie verhaften. -Ja, wir lassen Sie verhaften.

translation.en: Remember when you thought it would be cool
to cheat on your wife with a prostitute and then beat her up?
translation.de: mit einer Prostituierten rumzumachen und sie dann zu verprügeln?

translation.en: Turns out, not so cool.
-Yeah, not so cool. -You little cunts.
-[girls gasp] -"Little C-words?"
Mr. Stevens, you crossed a line. That's nasty.
Guess what else is nasty?
I've peed in your pool.
translation.de: Ich habe in den Pool gepinkelt.

translation.en: A bunch.
How dare you? Get out of my way!
translation.de: Wie kannst du es wagen? Aus dem Weg!

translation.en: Oh, nice move, goalie.
[Blair] Yeah. Gave him the old "Wesley check".
By the way, my name is Blair, bitch.
translation.de: Ich heiße übrigens Blair, du Arschloch.

translation.en: -Can you "drink" me? -Yep.
God, I'm still absolutely starving.
-I've literally never been hungrier. -[groans]
Oh, y'all gonna be sorry.
Hey, Mr. Stevens? Could you shut the fuck up?
translation.de: Hey, Mr. Stevens? Könnten Sie Ihr Scheißmaul halten?

translation.en: ...and we asked about the help wanted poster. And he, like, hired us on the spot.
translation.de: ...wir sahen die Stellenausschreibung und wurden sofort eingestellt.

translation.en: Another great thing is the hours are flexible and they're open late.
translation.de: Wir haben flexible Arbeitszeiten und späte Öffnungszeiten.

translation.en: So, instead of going to parties, you can go to work.
translation.de: Statt auf Partys könnt ihr zur Arbeit gehen.

translation.en: That sounds fair.
So tell me, what's the pay?
-Oh. -Oh. I think it's like, um...
like a hundred...
Fifty?
A hundred fifty dollars an hour?
-[Sterling] Oh, no-- -[Blair] Dollars? No.
-Like, dimes an hour. -Yeah.
Obviously.
-That's fifteen bucks an hour. -Yeah.
[Blair] Right? Because when in, um--
Hi, Mr. Bowser! Meet our parents.
translation.de: Mr. Bowser! Das sind unsere Eltern.

translation.en: -Hi! -[Bowser] All right.
Yeah, all right.
Gotta get this... [mumbling]
Oh, hey, you know, hey. The kids...
Uh, they're good.
Uh, good job. Yeah.
-They're all right. -[Bowser] Yes, all right.
[chuckling] All right. Well, we will see y'all at home.
translation.de: Alles klar. Wir sehen uns zu Hause.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Be safe.
Blair, honey, don't you think maybe you should tie your hair back?
translation.de: Blair, Schatz, solltest du dir nicht die Haare zusammenbinden?

translation.en: You know, being around all this food.
Yeah. Yes, Mama.
Okay. Oh, nice to meet you.
Uh... toodle-oo, then.
Take care, Miss Cathy.
-Love you! -Bye! -[Debbie] Love y'all. -Drive safe.
Sterling, who am I?
Well, hey, who am I?
No, her hand's... Her hand's here.
Ah, Jesus. What's happening? Did y'all pay for that?
translation.de: Himmel. Was ist hier los? Habt ihr dafür gezahlt?

translation.en: You can just take it out of our fifty percent.
translation.de: Du kannst es aus unseren 50 % nehmen.

translation.en: Okay, girls, you need to understand that there's a seniority in this business,
translation.de: Okay, Mädels. In diesem Geschäft zählt Erfahrung.

translation.en: and I've been doing it much longer than you have, so that has earned me a certain level of status, see?
translation.de: Ich mache das schon länger als ihr, was mir einen gewissen Status verschafft.

translation.en: So I'll give you 2K
translation.de: Also gebe ich euch zwei Riesen

translation.en: and the name of my guy who'll fix your truck up for you cheap.
translation.de: und den Namen von jemandem, der den Truck billig repariert.

translation.en: Well, what if we don't accept that?
translation.de: Was, wenn wir das nicht akzeptieren?

translation.en: Oh, this is you playing hardball?
-Sure. -[chuckles] Okay.
Seeing as how you're underage
and can't secure a license to bounty hunt,
translation.de: und bekommt keine Lizenz zur Kopfgeldjagd.

translation.en: if you want to keep working with me,
I don't think you have any options but to accept my terms.
So, you want to keep working with us?
translation.de: Du willst also mit uns arbeiten?

translation.en: I suppose I could, uh, see your potential to broaden my access around these parts.
translation.de: Ich könnte mir vorstellen, dass ihr mir hier einige Kontakte verschafft.

translation.en: Oh, Jesus. [woman] Yelp says you don't close until eleven.
translation.de: -Jesus. -Auf Yelp steht, ihr schließt erst um elf.

translation.en: -So does your voicemail. -Goddamn it.
Visors on, let's go.
Come on.
And put that hair in a bun or somethin'. Fix it up.
[Blair] You sound like my mom.
